p: Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK)-SIAT1 cells were a gift from the Razi Vaccine and Serum Research Institute (Karaj, Iran). The cells were grown at 37 °C in 5% CO2 in DMEM, supplemented with 10% heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS; Invitrogen, USA), 1 mM sodium pyruvate (Merck, Germany), 2 mM L-glutamine (Merck, Germany), and 100 U/ml penicillin and 100 μg/ml streptomycin sulfate (Sigma-Aldrich, USA).
